data.content:
noun
plural valves
[count] a mechanical device that controls the flow of liquid, gas, etc., by opening and closing
They turned off the main water valve to the house.
a device in some musical instruments (such as trumpets) that you press to play different notes - see picture at plumbing
medical :a structure in the heart, stomach, etc., that temporarily stops the flow of fluid or that allows fluid to move in one direction only
a heart valve
Brit :vacuum tube

Tính từ
(kỹ thuật) có van
(thực vật học); (động vật học) có mảnh vỏ
